sentences.sContent: He confessed to the murder but later retracted his statement.
sentences.sCn: 他承认谋杀，但后来又翻供了。

remMethod.val: re(往后) + tract(拉) → 往后拉 → 收回； 缩回

words.tran: 可取消的，可缩回的；伸缩自如的
[外科] 牵开器；收缩筋；食言的人

trans.tranCn: 收回， 撤销； 缩回
trans.tranOther: if you retract something that you said or agreed, you say that you did not mean it
